A Social Proximity App
for GitHub

Git-Phaser uses iBeacons to make your public
GitHub profile
and repos visible to anyone
within a 50ft radius of you.

See profiles.

View location.

Find users.

Add contacts.

Get notifications.

Features

Good for meetups and conferences.

Have a history of people you've met.

Add them to your device contacts.

Finds users even if their app is closed.

Free and open source.

Does not track by location.

Does not drain your battery.

Test git-phaser for iOS on TestFlight.
Test git-phaser for iOS on TestFlight.
